content: It's not slacking off! Just like crops and veggies— once they're planted right, you gotta give 'em space. Let 'em soak in the sun, enjoy the breeze... That's how you get 'em to thrive.

content: {A豆豆眼}Yeee! Y—You scared me... I-I'm sorry, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>. What with all the insects flyin' about, I thought a huuuge one came flyin' right up to me just now...

content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, come over here~! I saved you a seat. If you've got some time, maybe we can just sit and space out a lickle...

content: Oh, no, I'm not callin' you an insect! Well mah, what I was tryna say was, <style=SizeSmall>would you like to sit by me mah~?</style> Totally fine if you don't!
